quiz.title: CSS Basics Quiz
quiz.description: Test your knowledge of basic CSS concepts with this quiz.

questions.explanation: CSS stands for Cascading Style Sheet and is used for styling web documents.

questions.text: Which property is used to change the text color of an element in CSS?
questions.explanation: The 'color' property in CSS is used to change the text color of an element.

questions.text: What does the 'box-sizing' property in CSS control?
questions.explanation: The 'box-sizing' property in CSS controls the sizing model for the box.

questions.text: In CSS, which property is used to create a flexible container and enable a flex context for its direct children?
questions.explanation: The 'display: flex' property is used to create a flexible container with flex properties for its direct children in CSS.

questions.text: Which CSS property is used to align items along the cross-axis in a flex container?
questions.explanation: The 'align-items' property in CSS is used to align flex items along the cross-axis of the flex container.

questions.text: Which CSS property is used to control the space between the cells of a table?
questions.explanation: The 'border-spacing' property in CSS is used to control the space between the cells of a table.

questions.text: Which CSS pseudo-class is used to select an element when it is being hovered over?
questions.explanation: The ':hover' pseudo-class in CSS is used to select an element when it is being hovered over by the mouse.
